name: ServiceWorkerGlobalScope.onnotificationclose
description: The ServiceWorkerGlobalScope.onnotificationclose property is an event handler called whenever the notificationclose event is dispatched on the ServiceWorkerGlobalScope object, that is when a user closes a displayed notification spawned by ServiceWorkerRegistration.showNotification().

refs.name: Notifications API
refs.description: The definition of 'onnotificationclick' in the 'Notifications API' specification.
